name: Daniel Wood
description: I am very warm, affectionate, honest, and sincere. I’m very attracted to the same type of woman. I am self made and very free to come and go as I wish, have be single for 5 years. I am stable, very clean, well spoken . I exercise daily and try to stay fit. I am VERY healthy and do not do drugs, smoke, or any other self destructive habits. I am well mannered and give and ask respect. Abusive behavior, verbal or physical, is totally unacceptable. I have worked in different parts of the world in various cultures, and am from united state in a city called California. Would love to meet a sincere woman who would like to share travel and perhaps life, if it works out that way. I am very generous, and I love giving attention to my special someone, and would love the same in return. Sincerity and trust are very important traits. Young is a state of mind, but fitness and staying active is my lifestyle of choice.
